mapper.sql: mm.member_id, mm.type, mm.open_id, mm.member_name, mm.nick_name, mm.telephone, mm.password, mm.point, mm.all_point, mm.member_level_id, mm.birthdate, mm.member_pic, mm.email, mm.sex, mm.referrer_id, mm.id_card, mm.regist_style, mm.is_valid, mm.deleted, mm.update_user_id, mm.update_time, mm.insert_user_id, mm.insert_time, mm.profession, mm.income, mm.post_code, mm.address, mm.province_code, mm.province_name, mm.city_code, mm.city_name, mm.district_code, mm.district_name,mm.oldphone

member_id, type, open_id, member_name, nick_name, telephone, password, point, all_point, member_level_id, birthdate, member_pic, email, sex, referrer_id, id_card, regist_style, is_valid, deleted, update_user_id, update_time, insert_user_id, insert_time,profession, income, post_code, address, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name,oldphone
mapper.select: select org.operate,org.storeid,org.storesubid from sys_user sysuser left join shp_org org on sysuser.org_id = org.org_id where sysuser.login_id = #{telphone}
mapper.update:
update public.mmb_saler
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
point = #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER},
all_point = #{allPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_level_id = #{memberLevelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthdate = #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_pic = #{memberPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
referrer_id = #{referrerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regist_style = #{registStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now(),
profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
income = #{income,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district_code = #{districtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district_name = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select mm.member_id, mm.type, mm.open_id, mm.member_name, mm.nick_name, mm.telephone, mm.password, mm.point, mm.all_point, mm.member_level_id, mm.birthdate, mm.member_pic, mm.email, mm.sex, mm.referrer_id, mm.id_card, mm.regist_style, mm.is_valid, mm.deleted, mm.update_user_id, mm.update_time, mm.insert_user_id, mm.insert_time, mm.profession, mm.income, mm.post_code, mm.address, mm.province_code, mm.province_name, mm.city_code, mm.city_name, mm.district_code, mm.district_name, ccs.display_cn as sex_name,mm.oldphone from public.mmb_saler mm left join com_code ccs on ccs.code = 'SEX' and ccs.value = mm.sex where mm.is_valid = '0' and mm.deleted = '0' and mm.telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by mm.telephone LIMIT #{needColumns,jdbcType=INTEGER} offset #{startPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) as count from public.mmb_saler mm where mm.is_valid = '0' and mm.deleted = '0' and mm.telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) as count from mmb_saler mm where mm.telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select mm.member_id, mm.type, mm.open_id, mm.member_name, mm.nick_name, mm.telephone, mm.password, mm.point, mm.all_point, mm.member_level_id, mm.birthdate, mm.member_pic, mm.email, mm.sex, mm.referrer_id, mm.id_card, mm.regist_style, mm.is_valid, mm.deleted, mm.update_user_id, mm.update_time, mm.insert_user_id, mm.insert_time, mm.profession, mm.income, mm.post_code, mm.address, mm.province_code, mm.province_name, mm.city_code, mm.city_name, mm.district_code, mm.district_name,mm.oldphone from public.mmb_saler mm where mm.is_valid = '0' and mm.deleted = '0'
and mm.telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update mmb_saler set oldphone = '', update_user_id = 'ERP', update_time = now() where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select telephone, member_name, point,deleted from mmb_saler order by telephone
